info.description: Fake physics. I wish there was a way to do this for real.

renderpass.code:
#define M 6

#define N ((M+1)*3)


#define R iResolution.xy
#define A(U) texture(iChannel0,(U)/R)
#define B(U) texture(iChannel1,(U)/R)
#define Main void mainImage(out vec4 Q, in vec2 U)
#define ei(a) mat2(cos(a),sin(a),-sin(a),cos(a))
#define pi 3.14159265


#define normaliz(v) (length(v)>0.?normalize(v):vec2(0))
